trans-unit.source: Indicates that an object's text representation is obscured by characters such as asterisks.
This class cannot be inherited.
If the PasswordPropertyTextAttribute attribute is placed on a property or a type, its text representation in a property window appears as dots or asterisks to indicate a password field.
> [!CAUTION] > This indication in no way represents any type of encryption or security.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PasswordPropertyTextAttribute"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PasswordPropertyTextAttribute"></xref> class, optionally showing password text.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the property should be shown as password text; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Specifies the default value for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PasswordPropertyTextAttribute"></xref>.
The default value is <xref:System.ComponentModel.PasswordPropertyTextAttribute>.
To be added.
Determines whether two <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PasswordPropertyTextAttribute"></xref> instances are equal.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PasswordPropertyTextAttribute"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PasswordPropertyTextAttribute"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PasswordPropertyTextAttribute"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PasswordPropertyTextAttribute"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A hash code for the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PasswordPropertyTextAttribute"></xref>.
Returns an indication whether the value of this instance is the default value.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this instance is the default attribute for the class; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Specifies that a text property is not used as a password.
This <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Shared" name="Shared" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) field is read-only.
The No field is the default value for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PasswordPropertyTextAttribute>.
To be added.
Gets a value indicating if the property for which the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PasswordPropertyTextAttribute"></xref> is defined should be shown as password text.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property should be shown as password text; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Specifies that a text property is used as a password.
This <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Shared" name="Shared" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) field is read-only.
To be added.
